Sentencas: The present work aims at producing an electrocatalyst suitable to be used as anode in solid oxide fuel cells that operates with hydrocarbons or alcohols as fuels.
Titulo: CeO2-Co3O4-CuO anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A cerium-cobalt copper anode was developed, characterised and tested with hydrogen, anhydrous methane or anhydrous ethanol as fuels.
Titulo: CeO2-Co3O4-CuO anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The produced catalysts were characterised by X-ray and thermogravimetric analysis as well as H-2 temperature-programmed reduction and post oxidation.
Titulo: CeO2-Co3O4-CuO anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For electrochemical performance, i-V curves were taken in different test rigs, guaranteeing reproducibility.
Titulo: CeO2-Co3O4-CuO anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Additionally, electrochemical impedance spectroscopy was performed in order to determine cell's polarisation effects.
Titulo: CeO2-Co3O4-CuO anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Post-mortem analysis was done to assess carbon by Raman spectroscopy and temperature-programmed oxidation.
Titulo: CeO2-Co3O4-CuO anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Microstructure images were obtained by scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: CeO2-Co3O4-CuO anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cells have shown the ability to operate with hydrogen, methane, or ethanol with high performance.
Titulo: CeO2-Co3O4-CuO anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Negligible carbon was found in the post-mortem assessment after 24 h operation.
Titulo: CeO2-Co3O4-CuO anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, the multilayer anode showed to be promising for the direct utilisation of carbonaceous fuels.
Titulo: CeO2-Co3O4-CuO anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol in solid oxide fuel cells
